mutants.original_line: aphorism = 'You can\'t judge a book by its cover'
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = ''
    aphorism = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) == Counter(sentence)

import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = "You can't judge a book by its cover"
    aphorism = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) != Counter(sentence)

import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = "You can't judge a book by its cover"
    aphorism = re.sub('', '', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) == Counter(sentence)

import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = "You can't judge a book by its cover"
    aphorism = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) == Counter(sentence)

import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = "You can't judge a book by its cover"
    aphorism = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) == Counter(sentence)

import re
from collections import Counter

def perm_check(sentence):
    aphorism = "You can't judge a book by its cover"
    aphorism = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', aphorism).lower().split()
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence).lower().split()
    return Counter(aphorism) == Counter(sentence)
